name: Grappleman
description:
Grapple off bots and throw them at each other to fulfil your dream of reaching space.

The game is based around grappling yourself to enemies to both pull you around and throw them at each other to slow down time so you can line up your next grapple.

Enemies also have a type of pulse effect which affects each other as well as you and gives you their effect when you throw them.

Controls

Left mouse button to grapple to enemies aimed at your mouse location.

Click again to launch the enemy in the direction you're facing.
